SENT.plain: A 39-year-old polytransfused patient with aplastic anemia acquired transfusion-associated HTLV-I infection shortly before transplantation
The patient underwent allogeneic bone marrow transplantation and developed HTLV-I associated myelopathy 3 years later
Clinical abnormalities and a host of atypical findings are presented in the context of previous reports describing uncommon features of the disease
